programme.title: Crossing England in a Punt: River of Dreams
programme.desc: Tom Fort embarks on a 170-mile journey down the River Trent in his own custom-built punt. The presenter encounters the power stations that generate much of the nation's electricity, meets veterans of the floods of 1947 and learns about a Bronze Age boatman who made a life on the banks as he discovers the waterway's 3,000-year history

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Llanelli 3/5: Occupational nurse Christine hosts the third dinner party in Llanelli, where she tries to impress her guests with a menu of family favourites and a performance by her number one rock band. Charlotte and Meic stumble across the host's messy office, and trouble brews when Ainsley tells Christine that she looks like one of her exes

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
Three couples compete in Glasgow for the cash prize of £1,000. First to host are tearoom owner Melanie and her Irish husband David, who have blended together their heritages with a Celtic-fusion menu. Night two sees Kenny and Kenny, a married couple whose love of Mexico sees them trying to replicate authentic local food from their beloved country. Last to host are motormouth Ami and husband Stuart, who aim to impress with their well-presented Scottish food
S2020E22

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: Eastern Algarve: Jasmine Harman meets Peter and Karen Williams from Shropshire, who fell in love with Portugal's eastern Algarve 12 years ago and now want to relocate there permanently. Jasmine finds them five homes suited to their £150,000 budget, including a property reduced by £50,000, and a house that feels just like their place back in the UK

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Southern Spain: Keen walkers Rosie and Michael Mulroy from Durham are looking for a holiday home from which they can explore the stunning Andalusian hills and countryside around Frigiliana in southern Spain. Jasmine Harman shows them five properties for their £120,000 budget, from town centre apartments to quaint village townhouses, but will any of them appeal to both heart and head?

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
On the Costa Blanca, Manuel Rodriguez and daughter Sophie are hoping to make a transatlantic dream a reality. Clients Vinny and Julie met a decade ago online, and now American-born Julie and Briton Vinny are hungry for a third location where they can enjoy more romantic rendezvous time together. With 100,000 euros to spend, Vinny's determined to bag them a bargain, but the property must come with one thing - a barbecue
S05E09

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
Francesca and Carl, the owners of an Italian hamlet - which they have turned into a holiday complex - welcome the first guests of the season
S01E02

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:
Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are in Surrey, where they visit a collector of Kawasaki motorbikes
S05E07

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Guildford 1/5: In Guildford, Surrey, the first host is glamorous 22-year-old cosmetic-surgery-fan Shanice, who hopes to show she is more than just a pretty face by serving up sumptuous food and dazzling conversation. The guests she must impress are 32-year-old entertainer David, 69-year-old Norwegian plain-talker Vivi, 47-year-old super-competitive Neil and 25-year-old media sales worker Charlotte. With risky menu choices and a fellow diner's peculiar laughter taking the spotlight, will the conversations ranging from lookalikes to riding polar bears be enough to secure Shanice the prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Guildford 2/5: Retired estate agent Vivi hosts the second dinner party in and around Guildford. She is convinced her experience and original Scandinavian fayre can beat her less experienced competition and the soiree features Norwegian fish soup, ghost stories, ghost impressions, Norwegian singing and nursery rhymes

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Guildford 3/5: Sales manager Charlotte hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in and around Guildford, hoping to impress her guests enough to win the £1,000 prize money. However, she has taken a huge risk with an Asian-inspired menu, which could prove to be too exotic for entertainments manager David

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Guildford 4/5: The penultimate day in and around Guildford, Surrey, sees children's entertainments manager David playing host. Having worked in the entertainments industry all his life, he is no stranger to showing people a good time, and employs his colleagues to put on a performance, while keeping his food simple. Is he forgetting the key ingredients of a dinner party?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Guildford 5/5: On the final day in and around Guildford, Surrey, sales director Neil devises a sophisticated menu, dismissing his predecessors' efforts as unambitious. However, his unusual fayre is tempered by his choice of yodelling entertainment, which threatens to hinder his chance of scooping the £1,000 prize

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2023: Gran Canaria: Jean Johansson helps Ryan and Steve find a holiday home in the resort of Maspalomas on the island of Gran Canaria on a budget of £150,000

programme.title: Billionaire Blooms
programme.desc:
Cameras delve behind the scenes to observe the work of some of the UK's top florists as they create floral wonderlands for their super-wealthy clients. In this first episode, Jamie is in Italy for his toughest gig yet, the wedding of one of his most treasured clients. A multi-venue event spans four days and the length and breadth of Venice. Jamie needs to transport himself, his team of almost 40 and over 100,000 stems of the best flowers available everywhere by boat, in baking heat. Back in London, Afia tackles an outdoor wedding and has to think on her feet when construction issues threaten her design
S01E01

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc:
The charity version of the popular baking show returns, and with Noel Fielding on paternity leave, Matt Lucas is presenting on his own. In previous editions, comedian Tom Allen has stepped in to co-present - but today he is showing off his baking skills as one of the contestants, alongside Star Wars actress Daisy Ridley, comedian Rob Beckett and singer Alexandra Burke. To impress Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, the celebrities serve up millionaire shortbread, a fruity tart and their pet hates in cake form in the showstopper
S04E01

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows
S21E10

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The armchair critics scrutinise The Masked Singer, Trigger Point, Pam & Tommy, First Dates: Valentine's, Dancing on Ice, Dragons' Den, Mary Beard's Forgotten Art, and offer their take of a BBC News report on the rising cost of living
S19E01

programme.title: Frankie Boyle's Farewell to the Monarchy
programme.desc: The comedian takes a look back at the darker side of the royal family's 1000-year history, and wonders how generations of land-grabbing, child-murdering, wife-beheading, slave-trading, misogyny, violence and empire-building have shaped our royal family today. Frankie looks back to the reigns of six key monarchs who not only had huge influence in their day, but still live long in our collective memory - and finds troubling connections between their grim past and the present

programme.title: The Windsors
programme.desc: Comedy soap opera from the writers of Star Stories that imagines the royal family as they have never been seen before

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc:
Old Honkfoot: Greg Davies challenges the short-term memory and musicality of contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin as the five intrepid comedians approach the halfway point in the series. Frankie impresses with his falsetto, while Kiell wows everyone with his spoon retrieval abilities. Plus, Mae fakes their way into assistant Alex Horne's wallet
S15E05

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc:
Jimmy Carr hosts as Roisin Conaty and Kiri Pritchard-McLean take on Jon Richardson and Rob Beckett. Comedian Hugh Davies is in Dictionary Corner. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate
S22E01

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc:
A nutrition student hoping to meet a man who is open with his feelings finds she is not used to compliments during a date with a football coach, and has to brush up on her flirting. Elsewhere, two diners bond over their shared love of dogs, a farmer presents his date with a gift of beetroot, and a woman discovers she has met her supposedly blind date before
S20E03

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc:
Lisa Gets an A: Lisa tries to make amends for cheating in an exam, but the school authorities have a vested interest in high grades and turn a deaf ear to her confession that she bought the answers from Nelson. Meanwhile, Homer adopts a bizarre new pet - a lobster
S10E07

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Llanelli 4/5: Retired French teacher Meic hosts the fourth night of the competition in Llanelli, Carmarthenshire, and plans an authentic French menu including poulet Basquaise. Fellow diner Charlotte makes an impression when she arrives wearing an onion necklace, and the host hopes that his specially branded cremes brulees will impress his guests

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
Three rival duos compete in Glasgow, where highlights include a bit of karaoke, a game of guess that tune and one menu inspired by moments in the couple's relationship
S2020E13

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: Torrevieja, Spain: Laura Hamilton offers advice to Liverpool couple John and Wendy Houghton, who have been married for 43 years and have long dreamt of owning a holiday home around the Spanish coastal town of Torrevieja on the Costa Blanca. The property expert leaves no stone unturned in showing the pair how far their budget of £50,000 will stretch, with the couple viewing a two-bedroom apartment with scenic vistas and a ground-floor apartment located by a picture-perfect square

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Almeria, Spain: Retired couple Roger and Obie Pearce want a slice of the Spanish good life. Obie has never been to Spain before, and Roger hasn't visited since he was in the army 40 years ago, but they are determined to relocate to Almeria where Roger's health could benefit from the warm climate. Ben Hillman sets out to find them their perfect home on a budget of £120,000

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
In Almería, mother-and-son duo Sharon and Shaun catch up with love birds Janice and Bill who, when their property search began, had only been together six months. Meanwhile in Alicante, husband-and-wife team Damon and Sophie are visiting ex-clients Lisa and Graham who were also looking to permanently leave the UK for sunny Spain along with their son Jamie
S05E10

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
An unexpected delivery causes chaos at a medieval village in France. Meanwhile, Francesca and Carl, the owners of a hilltop hamlet in Italy, get started on a brand-new project
S01E03

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:
In Dumfries and Galloway, Simon O'Brien and Henry Cole meet Alan, who works in the forestry business. Henry decides to give four bar stools a dayglo makeover, while Simon transforms two old sheep shearer seats into an extraordinary bench
S05E08

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Perth 1/5: First aid manager Jacqui hosts the first dinner party in Perth, where she plans to impress her guests, optometric consultant Daniel, cabinet-maker Craig, administrator Lorea and procurement officer Jenna with her hearty cuisine, including a sticky toffee pudding

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Perth 2/5: Aspiring actor Daniel hosts the second dinner party in Perth, and hopes to impress his fellow contestants with a twist on the traditional Scottish menu - serving spaghetti hagginaise for his main and soft-drink flavoured ice-cream for dessert. But with outspoken guest Jenna admitting her dislike for the host, the attention is diverted away from the food

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Perth 3/5: For the third party from Perth, Lorea is on a mission to showcase the culinary delights of her native home in northern Spain, and her fiesta commences with a pink cocktail and an exotic quartet flown over from the Basque country especially to impress. She reveals that she used to model in the nude, which perplexes her guests, and there are tensions at bay between Daniel and Jenna, which threaten to spoil the evening

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Perth 4/5: Procurement officer Jenna hosts the fourth night of the competition in Perth, and tries to deliver the perfect evening. However, she struggles to hide her feelings toward aspiring actor Daniel after they have bickered all week, despite first aid manager Jacqui's attempts at reconciliation

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Perth 5/5: It is the final day in Perth, and Kiwi Craig's turn to throw a dinner party before the winner is named. He hopes that his land and sea menu of prime lobster and wild boar will see him score highly, but hadn't counted on Jenna and Craig's tiara quarrel from the night before raging on into his evening. The host tries his best to calm the couple, but tensions mount to the point where cutlery is slammed down and one guest storms out

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2023: Crete: Craig Rowe jets off to eastern Crete to help Andy and Vicky find their dream holiday home where they can enjoy the Cretan sun and Greek way of life. It's a special place for the couple, who have holidayed there together eight times. Craig shows Andy and Vicky five properties for them to consider, within their budget of £90,000

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc:
Isle of Wight, 2010: Kevin McCloud follows the progress of architectural designer Lincoln Miles and his wife, artist Lisa Traxler, who want to create their own home on the Isle of Wight. They have bought a property on a prime piece of land and set out to convert it into a creative structure that harmonises with the unspoilt woodland setting
S10E01

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc:
Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer search Oxfordshire for the perfect properties. Reena is looking for a geographical balance between her work in Oxford and her family in the Midlands, after house-hunting on and off for five years she enlists the help of Kirstie in the hope of bringing her search to an end. Tan and Steve live an hour apart and are looking for a place to call their own, Phil has his work cut out searching for the open-plan living space they want in the expensive area they are searching in
S39E01

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The armchair critics scrutinise The Masked Singer, Trigger Point, Pam & Tommy, First Dates: Valentine's, Dancing on Ice, Dragons' Den, Mary Beard's Forgotten Art, and offer their take of a BBC News report on the rising cost of living
S19E01

programme.title: xXx: The Next Level (2005)
programme.desc: The American secretary of defence forms a covert military organisation with the intention of assassinating the president. A government spymaster is ready to foil the plot but, since his top agent is dead, he has to recruit an imprisoned soldier to help him. Action sequel, starring Ice Cube, Samuel L Jackson and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc:
It's My Milk Now: Contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin continue to address the challenges set for them. Greg Davies has some tricky judging to do when people question the definition of the colour gold and nobody understands a simple egg-shelling task. As usual, Alex Horne offers sterling support to all concerned
S15E06

programme.title: The Windsors
programme.desc: Comedy soap opera from the writers of Star Stories that imagines the royal family as they have never been seen before

programme.desc:

S21E10

Frankie looks back to the reigns of six key monarchs who not only had huge influence in their day, but still live long in our collective memory - and finds troubling connections between their grim past and the present

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc:
Simpsons Bible Stories: Homer, Marge and the kids fall asleep during a tediously protracted sermon by the Rev Lovejoy, and enjoy a series of colourful dreams in which they appear as characters from the Old Testament
S10E18

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc:
Jimmy Carr hosts the game show mash-up, with Rachel Riley and Susie Dent. Jon Richardson and Sara Pascoe take on Sean Lock and Richard Ayoade. Nick Helm joins Susie in Dictionary Corner
S21E04

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc:
Married couple Abbie and Charlie join host Anna Richardson and feature as the first picker pair as they search for another woman to join their relationship. Plus 41 year-old actor and glamour puss Chrissie from Leeds is hoping to find husband number four
S11E03

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc:
Chester's 18 chimpanzees face upheaval when new female chimp Vila arrives from a zoo in Germany. Meanwhile, nine-year-old cheetah mum Kinky Tail is vomiting after meals, and her three-year-old daughter Safi must watch and wait as her mum is taken to the zoo's medical centre. Cameras also follow Asian short-clawed otter Annie, who recently gave birth to a large litter of five pups
S03E03

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Glasgow 2/5: Butcher Graeme Curley hosts the second night in Glasgow, where he has planned a meaty menu complete with pork ribs. He hopes to wow his guests by serving steak - and by bringing some of his trade to the dinner table

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
In Belfast, three couples compete to host the best dinner party. Sarah and Paddy kick things off with a fine-dining feast for guests Louise and Danny and Emma and Samson. The hosts mix Eastern and traditional fare. Then, on night two Emma and Samson treat their guests to some Mozambican delights. After a first course that whistles and wows, palates need to be cleansed for the main course, but a chilly chat about ice-cream leaves Louise red in the face. On the final night, Louise and Danny confound everyone's expectations with a sailing-based starter. A spot of model behaviour excites the guests, and a mountain of meringue impresses, but is it enough to win the £1,000 prize?
S2020E04

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: Axarquia: Jasmine Harman helps Chris and Dan Boettcher from Bedfordshire find a holiday home in the Axarquia region of Spain's Costa del Sol on their budget of £70,000. They view five properties, hoping one of them will be the retreat they can escape to with their family without too much prior planning

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Costa Blanca: Engaged couple Kay Havard and Paul Young wish to buy a holiday home for romantic weekends away and to share with family and friends. Scarlette Douglas does her best to impress them with five properties on Spain's Costa Blanca for their budget of £80,000

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
In Almería, husband-and-wife team Steve and Sharon Garner help teaching duo Amanda and Paul find their perfect Spanish property, where they can enjoy their retirement. In the province of Alicante, darts enthusiast David and his wife Jane are hoping to hit the bullseye with a holiday home located close to bars and restaurants. On hand to help the duo find their dream property are sisters Sophie and Charlotte
S05E14

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
Mick and Julie's medieval hamlet has gruesome secrets buried in the walls. Norwich couple Ted and Lesa try to renovate a village in France while living in a tent. Londoner Penny is hoping to sell her beautifully restored Italian borgo
S01E06

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:
Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien head to Dumfries and Galloway to memorabilia heaven. Simon spots an unloved corner unit at a charity depot that he plans on upcycling
S06E01

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lancashire 1/5: Dry-cleaning manager Valerie hosts the first dinner party in Lancashire, where she plans to impress her guests with a lamb hotpot and trifle. However, it remains to be seen whether her warm-hearted hospitality will be enough to win her the £1,000 prize by the end of the week

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lancashire 2/5: Dance teacher Nicky hosts the second night in Lancashire, where she hopes to impress her guests with a round-the-world themed menu inspired by her dancing tours, which includes a Chinese salmon starter, and an American dessert. However, with fellow contestant Peggy born in the United States, the host may have her work cut out in presenting the perfect dish

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lancashire 3/5: Outsourcing manager Steve hosts the third night in Lancashire, where the 51-year-old plans to wow his guests with a 'man of the world' menu that relies heavily on strong Indian spices. Peggy picks him up on his shop-bought black pudding, while Nicky is unimpressed by the mildness of the chicken balti, resulting in a humiliating chilli-sauce challenge

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lancashire 4/5: American Peggy hosts a USA-themed dinner party on the fourth night of the competition in Lancashire, and hopes her Arizonan recipes will be enough to win her the £1,000 prize. Her menu comprises tried and tested dishes, including her dessert of peach dump cake. However, friction between her and fellow contestant Steve continues to build

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lancashire 5/5: It is the final dinner party in Lancashire, and the turn of sales manager Andy to host. He is confident in his locally sourced gastro menu and delivers a meal with plenty of flair, but faces the challenge of impressing foodie Nicky. He is also under pressure to convince American Peggy of the merits of the region's food, while his fellow Lancastrians Valerie and Steve are keen to see how the area has influenced his cooking

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2023: Madeira, Portugal: Ben Hillman helps Emma and Shane from Cornwall find their dream holiday home in Madeira on a budget of £200,000

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc:
Singer Ellie Goulding, comedian Mawaan Rizwan, TV presenter and disability advocate Sophie Morgan and actress Tracy-Ann Oberman take part in the charity baking show. Under the watchful eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith they tackle marble cake and jam roly-poly, before making a showstopping biscuit in honour of their celebrity hero. Presented by Noel Fielding and Matt Lucas
S05E05

programme.title: Sarah Beeny's New Life in the Country
programme.desc:
Sarah and Graham start work on their grand plans for the outside of their home - to create a mini clock tower, complete with a bell, on the roof of the exterior building. But once it's up, they find out that it doesn't fit onto the timber housing. Sarah and Laurie also make a unique family flag and Graham personalises the weathervane
S03E04

programme.title: Andrew: The Problem Prince
programme.desc:
The second of two programmes telling the inside story of Prince Andrew's 2019 Newsnight interview with Emily Maitlis and the subsequent chain of events that led to a royal disaster. In the 1980s, Andrew was a Falklands war hero and a national heart-throb, glory years that culminated in his marriage to Sarah Ferguson. But following his departure from the Navy, his image took a turn as his new role as trade envoy proved unsuccessful - and his need to fund a lavish lifestyle and friendship with Jeffrey Epstein eventually prompted the interview that cemented his downfall
S01E02

programme.title: Con Air (1997)
programme.desc: Honourably discharged Army Ranger sergeant Cameron Poe hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals. When they hijack the plane in mid-flight, led by criminal mastermind Cyrus the Virus, Poe is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, US marshal Vince Larkin has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Director Simon West's blockbusting action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc:
A 76-year-old man sustains a head injury after falling down some stairs, and his daughter reflects on how his caring for her mother through her dementia has left him exhausted. A five-year-old girl is brought into the paediatric department with a large splinter lodged in her bottom, and a patient has a lump on her shoulder that has developed since having a fall five weeks ago
S24E03

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc:
A woman collapses in the street while out shopping and may have broken her hip, while a man threatens to take an overdose if the paramedics do not take him to hospital
S05E05

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc:
Sonya, a 77-year-old tour guide who has been widowed for 15 years, is looking for a man to share experiences with, and is set up on a date with 69-year-old film rigger Graham. Meanwhile, 26-year-old florist Charlotte meets 29-year-old data analyst Adam from Blackpool, and former dancer and extrovert Patrick goes on a date with laid-back graphic designer Seph
S20E04

programme.title: Celebrity Hunted
programme.desc:
With just 48 hours till extraction, Saffron and Bobby take a risk and go solo. Nik and Eva continue to taunt the hunters with a postcard from the Welsh coast but their route to the extraction point is nerve-wracking. Hunter HQ use every trick they have in the final push to catch the celebrities before they are extracted and tensions rise with close calls, a motorway pursuit and a desperate foot race as the competition comes to an adrenaline-fuelled end
S05E06

programme.title: Guy Martin's Best Bits
programme.desc:
Guy Martin's World Speed Records: The presenter looks back at times when he helped to build and pilot amazing machines to world speed records, and tells the fascinating stories behind the record attempts
S01E01

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Glasgow 3/5: Hairdresser Michelle Blackett is the host on day three in Glasgow, and hopes to impress the diners by preparing a menu of exceedingly well-appointed food. Over the course of the evening, Michelle's guests discover her hidden heritage, and hospitality student Erwin - who speaks five languages - does his best to add the 'Glaswegian' dialect to his arsenal

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
Couples try to outdo one another by throwing the perfect dinner party in Co Antrim. Newlyweds Rebecca and Gareth kick things off, attempting to add some spice to proceedings with a Mexican fiesta. Next to host are care workers Nel and Billy, who rustle up a Filipino menu. Finishing off the week are smallholders Mandy and Jim, who serve up a Filipino roast pig dish followed by baked Alaska
S2020E27

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: Costa Calida: Recently divorced Patricia Malty from Devon wants to make a fresh start on the Costa Calida in Spain after selling her home and moving in with her best friend, with Laura Hamilton helping her find suitable properties for her £90,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Fuerteventura: Lynne and Peter Evans have spent the last 15 years living on a Greek island and, now they're based back in the UK, are hankering after a second home in the sun. Fuerteventura has held a special place in their hearts ever since they first went there on holiday with their two children so they think it's the perfect place to buy. Ben Hillman needs all of his property know-how to show them five options for their £80,000 budget

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
In Almería, mother-and-son team Sharon and Shaun Garner catch up with Phil and Jeanette who were buying their first ever home together two years ago to see the fruits of their labour. In Alicante, father-and-daughter duo Manuel and Sophie Rodriguez also visit ex-clients, getting a progress report from Sue and Richard, who were looking for a holiday home for their budget of 130,000 euros
S05E15

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
A family from Manchester transform a hamlet in France. Meanwhile, a young couple fall in love with an earthquake-damaged Italian borgo, and a couple of B&B owners in the Pyrenees buy a ramshackle holiday village built by the Catholic church in the 1930s
S01E16

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:
Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien head to Pembrokeshire to meet a cattle breeder whose barns include a pair of discarded horns, and a camper van fan with a vintage pedal car
S06E02

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Leeds 1/5: Nursing manager Sarah hosts the first of a week of dinner parties in Leeds, taking inspiration from her husband's Middle Eastern heritage to offer her guests a Turkish fusion menu. Joining her is 28-year-old painter decorator Alex, 45-year-old bridal shop owner Abbi, 60-year-old community centre manager Janet and 56-year-old record label boss Phil. A hilarious evening lies in store, with unexpected tattoos, beauty tips and twerking

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Leeds 2/5: Would-be clairvoyant Janet hosts the second of a week of dinner parties in Leeds and hopes her ghoul-themed dinner party will help her win the cash prize. Part of Janet's plan is to pretend her house is haunted and she has a practical joke lined up for nursing manager Sarah and bridal shop owner Abbi to find. With more surprises in store, will the fright-night theme be enough to ghost Janet into the lead?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Leeds 3/5: Record label owner Phil hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Leeds, hoping to win the £1,000 prize money by serving up a 1970s rock-themed menu. His guests are astounded by his mystery past, and painter and decorator Alex is unimpressed when wedding shop owner Abbi continues to wind him up

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Leeds 4/5: Painter and decorator Alex hosts the fourth night in Leeds, hoping to win the prize money by serving up a cruise-themed menu from around the world - which impresses jealous rival Janet so much, she almost turns violent. Abbi continues to belittle the host - until he reveals he spends his evenings on stage impersonating a famous heart-throb singer. Will his performance bag him the top prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Leeds 5/5: Bridal shop owner Abbi hopes to woo her guests with a wedding-themed party on the final day of the competition in Leeds. All week Abbi and Michael Buble impersonator Alex have had a bit of a banter that has sailed close to the wind. Will the tension take over, or can the wedding theme create an amorous atmosphere that will help Abbi win the £1,000 prize?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Florida: Jason and Lindsay Crossland from East Yorkshire met 28 years ago when they were working for the RAF. Lindsay suffers from osteoarthritis, which affects her mobility, and as warm sunshine helps her condition their dream is to spend every school holiday in Florida with their son before eventually retiring there. They have a budget of up to £180,000, but will Ben Hillman be able to find them what they're looking for?

programme.title: Billionaire Blooms
programme.desc:
Jamie's in Venice with a limitless budget and complete creative freedom, fashioning two stunning set-ups for the wedding of one of his most treasured clients. He has assembled a squad of talented florists to help him as he transforms an ancient palazzo and a world-famous hotel. On the outskirts of Edinburgh, Ian and his team of florists attempt their biggest ever floral arch. It's just the starting point of an epic installation within a stunning castle. With so many weddings scheduled for the summer, time is the biggest pressure so there's not a moment to waste
S01E02

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc:
Singer Ellie Goulding, comedian Mawaan Rizwan, TV presenter and disability advocate Sophie Morgan and actress Tracy-Ann Oberman take part in the charity baking show. Under the watchful eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith they tackle marble cake and jam roly-poly, before making a showstopping biscuit in honour of their celebrity hero. Presented by Noel Fielding and Matt Lucas
S05E05

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows
S21E11

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The opinionated TV viewers pass judgement on the best and worst shows of December 2013, including Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, A Great British Christmas with Sarah Beeny and I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!
S02E11

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc:
It's My Milk Now: Contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin continue to address the challenges set for them. Greg Davies has some tricky judging to do when people question the definition of the colour gold and nobody understands a simple egg-shelling task. As usual, Alex Horne offers sterling support to all concerned
S15E06

programme.title: The Kidnap of Angel Lynn
programme.desc: Using exclusive interviews, social media and immersive graphics, this documentary tells the story of the abusive relationship that led to the life-altering abduction of Angel Lynn. At just 18 years-old, Angel met her boyfriend through a mutual friend and he rapidly became abusive towards her, isolating her and ultimately abducting her. After being forced into a van, Angel fell from the back of the speeding vehicle and was left on the side of the road with near-fatal injuries that left her unable to walk, speak or feed herself. Her story is retold as she learns to live again

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc:
Anna Richardson is joined by 25 year-old Lauren, a movie buff and professional online gamer from Camberley who is looking for a geeky gamer to be her perfect player two so she can reboot her love life after three years of being single. Ryan who is 28 and from Cheltenham, is looking for his Mr Right. As a sucker for a silver fox and a dad bod, can he find his dream guy to wake up to every morning?
S11E04

programme.title: The Great Auction Challenge with Paul Martin
programme.desc:
The presenter takes on fellow antiques experts and auctioneers in a series of challenges that test their knowledge and deal-making skills, before going head to head in the saleroom. The first week sees Paul in the West Midlands where his opening opponent is Rachel Holland, with locals bringing their antiques and collectibles to an open valuation day, with only the best items to be put under the hammer
S01E01

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc:
Sonya, a 77-year-old tour guide who has been widowed for 15 years, is looking for a man to share experiences with, and is set up on a date with 69-year-old film rigger Graham. Meanwhile, 26-year-old florist Charlotte meets 29-year-old data analyst Adam from Blackpool, and former dancer and extrovert Patrick goes on a date with laid-back graphic designer Seph
S20E04

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc:
Brilliant Builds: Storage Hacks and Smart Spends: Stoke couple Julie and Allen cannot agree on any of the houses they have viewed together, but they are also at a loss as to how they can make their current three-bedroom abode any better. In Newcastle, GP Kathleen and her anaesthetist husband Tom have a three-bedroom Victorian semi in disorganised chaos with Tom's sporting gear taking root everywhere. Should they move on or reconfigure the downstairs?
S02E03

programme.title: The Love Punch (2013)
programme.desc: A man on the brink of retirement discovers his pension has been stolen by his company's crooked new owner. He and his ex-wife head to France with a plan to get even by stealing a valuable diamond necklace the ruthless executive has bought for his fiancee. Crime comedy, starring Pierce Brosnan, Emma Thompson and Timothy Spall

programme.title: Proximity (2020)
programme.desc: A young scientist is abducted by extra-terrestrials, but when no one believes his story he becomes obsessed with finding proof, which leads him on a journey of discovery. Writer/director Eric Demeusy's sci-fi drama, starring Ryan Masson, Highdee Kuan and Christian Prentice

programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.title: Bulletproof (2019)
programme.desc: Over the course of one night in the squad car of LAPD beat cop Nick Holland and his seasoned partner Ray, they make a handful of arrests. Ray also investigates the disappearance of his late colleague's eight-year-old daughter. Writer/director Joel Souza's crime thriller, starring Thomas Jane, Luke Kleintank and Bridget Moynahan

programme.title: Burden (2018)
programme.desc: When a museum celebrating the Ku Klux Klan opens in a South Carolina town, the idealistic Reverend Kennedy strives to keep the peace even as he urges the group's Grand Dragon to disavow his racist past. Drama, starring Garrett Hedlund, Andrea Riseborough, Forest Whitaker and Tom Wilkinson

programme.title: All Roads Lead to Rome (2015)
programme.desc: A teacher is reunited with her ex-boyfriend while staying in an Italian village. The former lovers are forced to work together when her teenage daughter and his 80-year-old mother steal a car and run away to Rome together, the former hoping to return home to her boyfriend and the latter planning to remarry against her son's wishes. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Raoul Bova and Claudia Cardinale

programme.title: The Others (2001)
programme.desc: A woman awaits the return of her husband from the Second World War while struggling to care for her son and daughter. Both children suffer a violent reaction when exposed to daylight, forcing her to keep much of their isolated home on the island of Jersey shrouded in gloom. When the pair claim to see strangers in the house, their terrified mother begins to suspect that the souls of the dead are stalking the halls. Period supernatural thriller, starring Nicole Kidman, Fionnula Flanagan, Alakina Mann, James Bentley and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Walking Out (2017)
programme.desc: An urban teenager journeys to Montana to hunt big game with his estranged father. The duo struggle to connect, until a brutal encounter in the wilderness changes everything. Adventure, starring Matt Bomer, Josh Wiggins and Bill Pullman

programme.title: Robert the Bruce (2019)
programme.desc: Following the execution of William Wallace, Robert the Bruce has suffered a number of losses. Ex-communicated and with a large bounty on his head, the wounded, hunted warrior seeks refuge with a single mother and her family, and reflects on the choices he must make if he wishes to lead Scotland to victory. Drama, starring Angus Macfadyen, Jared Harris, Anna Hutchison and Patrick Fugit

programme.title: The Congress (2013)
programme.desc: An ageing out-of-work actress receives an offer from a major studio to sell her cinematic identity to them to use in future productions. Sci-fi drama, starring Robin Wright and Harvey Keitel

However, the pressures of striving for success force the teenager to make a difficult decision. Moving drama, directed by and starring acclaimed film-maker Chen Kaige, with Liu Peiqi, Tang Yun and Chen Hong

programme.title: A Good Woman (2004)
programme.desc: A 1930s Manhattan socialite feels jaded by her numerous failed affairs and sets out for a new life in Italy on the Amalfi Coast, where she strikes up a friendship with a newlywed Englishman who helps her regain her standing in society. However, their closeness is soon mistaken for an affair and society is scandalised. Comedy drama, based on Oscar Wilde's play Lady Windermere's Fan, starring Helen Hunt, Mark Umbers, Scarlett Johansson and Tom Wilkinson
